channel.title: Spawner punishment/avoidance help
channel.description:
I have been trying to get rid of spawners on the server, I fixed it on my client, but they download other clients, I want to add a thing where i can create something that I just basically ::spawner (name) them
It would basically make it so they couldn't trade or drop or drop anythhing when they die, please help me out wth this cause I really really am sick of those dumb spawners that come to ruin my server

item.title: Spawner punishment/avoidance help
item.dc:creator: @deathe1000 deathe1000
item.description:
@deathe1000 wrote:

Onix:

Just stop the server from accepting that packet from the client?

how could i do that?!

Read full topic

item.title: Spawner punishment/avoidance help
item.dc:creator: @deathe1000 deathe1000
item.description:
@deathe1000 wrote:

Onix:

Create a list (array) to hold the names of these ‘flagged accounts’. Your command will simply add the account names to the flagged list. Then you will need to check if they are flagged before they trade, drop items on death and whatever else you want. Also spawning is removed server sided, is it not?

it is removed, i took it out of playerassistant and cmmands so no one can spawn with my client unless their name is mine haha

can you explain exactly how to do this because i dont know how to code that well

Read full topic

item.title: Spawner punishment/avoidance help
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

Create a list (array) to hold the names of these ‘flagged accounts’. Your command will simply add the account names to the flagged list. Then you will need to check if they are flagged before they trade, drop items on death and whatever else you want. Also spawning is removed server sided, is it not?

Read full topic
